divs: Sighting Detailsjust got off work,going down forth st.at the bridge i could see tward mansfield.i see a big object over that way, its dark out but i see lights.I get off onto U.S.30 east.When i get down by the 13 exit a little before that by the steel mill i see an object with 3 white lights in a triangle shape traveling from south to north.It was traveling twards the flat side of its triangle shape,instead of its pointed side.as it came over my vehicle i heard a womans voice in my head say hi jim.as it went over tward the north it dove down, this thing was as big a c5a.then turned right then left and gained in altitude slightly then headed west.how did she know me?how did she talk to me from up there?how did she pick me to say hi out of all the cars on the road?who is she?
Summary: saw 3 lights big went north over highway 30 right over my head hear womans voice say my name dives turns right then left twards the west out of sight
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Mansfield
There were no other sightings in Mansfield on or around September 18th 2002
